vulnerability_findings.name: calls-loop
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(caddress.call(id, from, _tos[i], v)); // added require statement to check the return value of the call
vulnerability_findings.message:
AirPort.transfer has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(caddress.call(id,from,_tos[i],v)) (patch_11.sol#9)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in AirPort.transfer (patch_11.sol#5-12):
	-require(bool)(caddress.call(id,from,_tos[i],v)) patch_11.sol#9

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: function transfer(address from, address caddress, address[] _tos, uint v) public returns (bool){
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_tos' of AirPort.transfer (patch_11.sol#5) is not in mixedCase
